select.foreach:
union all
SELECT #{getYandM} as yearAndMonth, T007.customerName, T006.customerNo, T006.unitPrice, T018.DeductionsAndOvertimePay, T006.employeeNo, CONCAT(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName)as employeeName, M012.siteRoleName, M013.stationName FROM T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 left join T018WorkTotalTime As T018 on T018.employeeNo =T006.employeeNo and #{getYandM} =T018.attendanceYearAndMonth left join T007CustomerInfo As T007 on T006.customerNo =T007.customerNo left join T001Employee As T001 on T006.employeeNo=T001.employeeNo left join M012SiteRole As M012 on M012.siteRoleCode=T006.siteRoleCode left join M013Station as M013 on T006.stationCode =M013.stationCode WHERE #{getYandM} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m'))

union
select * from (select ${tempList.yearAndMonth} as yearAndMonth,T005.employeeNo, T005.totalAmount, T006.customerNo from T005WagesInfo As T005 left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 on T006.employeeNo =T005.employeeNo and #{tempList.yearAndMonth} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m')) WHERE T005.employeeNo= #{tempList.empNo} and T006.customerNo=#{tempList.customerNo} and reflectYearAndMonth <= #{tempList.yearAndMonth} ORDER BY ABS(#{tempList.yearAndMonth} - reflectYearAndMonth) ASC limit 1) As A${tempList.yearAndMonth}

union
select * from(select ${tempList.yearAndMonth} as yearAndMonth, T013.totalExpenses, T006.customerNo from T013ExpensesInfo As T013 left join T006EmployeeSiteInfo As T006 on T006.employeeNo =T013.employeeNo and #{tempList.yearAndMonth} between left(admissionStartDate,6) and IFNULL(admissionEndDate,date_format(now(),'%Y%m')) where T013.employeeNo =#{tempList.empNo} and expensesReflectYearAndMonth <= #{tempList.yearAndMonth} ORDER BY ABS(#{tempList.yearAndMonth}- expensesReflectYearAndMonth) ASC limit 1 ) As B${tempList.yearAndMonth}
